title: Is buying skins from lolskins.com legal
body: I'm not trying to advertise I'm just wondering If I'm allowed to purchase stuff from the store, by the way I haven't bought any  . The reason I ask is they have pax stuff for sale

replies.body: You actually get life imprisonment if you are caught purchasing any skins, watch out my friend :)
I'm a jail inmate, can confirm lots of league of legend skin buyers in here.
Now that skin codes have been disabled you can't actually buy any of the skins from that site.
I bought a skin from there, I just got sentenced to 20 years non parole.
Riot disabled skin codes available through such websites. It's not illegal but you'll be wasting your money since you wont be able to use them.
